meanings.sent1: The overpotent superhero lifted the car effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The giant robot was overpotent, able to crush anything in its path.
meanings.sent3: The overpotent toddler managed to move the heavy table all by himself.
meanings.sent4: Her overpotent determination was like a raging fire, unstoppable and fierce.
meanings.sent5: The overpotent storm wreaked havoc on the small town, leaving destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: Having an excessive amount of potency or strength.
meanings.sent1: The overpotent potion was too strong and caused unexpected side effects.
meanings.sent2: The overpotent athlete broke the world record effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The overpotent chili was so spicy that it made everyone cry.
meanings.sent4: His overpotent arguments always left his opponents speechless.
meanings.sent5: The overpotent perfume filled the room with an overwhelming scent.
